---
title: "STV @ Kaipara District Council"
---

There were four STV elections for Kaipara District Council in 2019.

## Mayor

One seat elected from two candidates in one iteration.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374783086" width="640" height="256" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Dargaville Ward

Two seats elected from six candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374783049" width="640" height="358" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Otamatea Ward

Two seats elected from five candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374783125" width="640" height="334" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## West Coast Central Ward

Two seats elected from three candidates in one iteration.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374783174" width="640" height="282" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
